title: Dr. Muhammad Yunus Honored for Social Business Innovations
description: Nobel Laureate Dr. Muhammad Yunus has received international recognition once again for his pioneering work in microfinance and social business. Speaking at the Global Impact Forum, Yunus emphasized the need for inclusive financial systems to alleviate poverty and empower communities. His Grameen Bank model has influenced social entrepreneurs worldwide.
